Name: Stela of Ii
Description: The rounded upper section of this stela contains two udjat-eyes and two reclining jackals facing each other. Underneath are two lines of text, divided in the middle, containing the offering formulae for Wepwawet and Anubis. The central section of the stela contains four pairs of people in separate squares. In each square, a man and a woman sit, or kneel, facing one another, separated by the captions. In the lower section of the stela are seven lines of text; six mention people, the seventh contains the offering formula. Some traces of the original paint are still visible.
